sentences.en: After a few hours of fierce fighting, we saw the intruding bandits off.
sentences.cn: 经过几小时的激烈战斗, 我们赶走了入侵的匪徒.

sentences.en: Dear Annik, I know I'm intruding on your life, not you on mine.
sentences.cn: 亲爱的Annik, 我知道是我打乱了你的生活, 而不是你打乱我的.

sentences.en: Does he find his new celebrity intruding on his private life?
sentences.cn: 他是否感觉到他最近的成名侵扰了他的私生活？

sentences.en: He is always intruding his opinions upon others.
sentences.cn: 他老是把自己的意见强加给别人.

sentences.en: He is not intruding on any secret romance.
sentences.cn: 他碰上的不是什么不可告人的爱情场面.

sentences.en: I felt as though I was intruding on their private grief.
sentences.cn: 他们正伤心时,我觉得我好像骚扰了他们.

sentences.en: The press has been blamed for intruding into people's personal lives in an unacceptable way.
sentences.cn: 新闻媒体因为以令人难以容忍的方式侵扰人们的私生活而一直受到指责。

sentences.en: The voyage home began, but not before an intruding aeroplane had repeatedly circled the ship.
sentences.cn: 开始返航了，但是在这之前一架入侵的飞机曾反复在轮船上空盘旋。

sentences.en: They let off their guns at the intruding enemy ships.
sentences.cn: 他们向入侵的敌舰开炮.

sentences.en: They would feel that they were intruding.
sentences.cn: 他们会觉得他们在打扰我们.

sentences.en: Two intruding enemy planes were picked up by our radar installation.
sentences.cn: 我方雷达发现了两架入侵敌机.

sentences.en: We all felt as if we were intruding on his private grief.
sentences.cn: 我们都觉得似乎触及到了他内心的伤痛。

sentences.en: We brought the intruding enemy ship to by firing across her bows.
sentences.cn: 我们向入侵敌舰的船头前开炮,迫使该舰停下.

trans.tran_cn: 侵入，侵扰，打扰( intrude的现在分词)，把…强加于
